channel.title: Today In Perspective
channel.itunes:subtitle: News & current events from a historical perspective.
channel.itunes:author: Jeremy Kerr
channel.itunes:summary: News & current events from a historical perspective.
channel.description: News & current events from a historical perspective.

item.title: Today In Perspective Week of January 22, 2009
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jill Clark, Jeremy Kerr
item.itunes:subtitle: Inaugurations Kill Birds
item.itunes:summary: This week we take a look at the history of US Presidential Inaugurations and this week’s historical inauguration of President Barack Obama.
item.itunes:keywords: news, history, first, inauguration, barack, obama, president, washington

item.title: Today In Perspective Week of January 15, 2009
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jeremy Kerr, Jill Clark
item.itunes:subtitle: The Lottery: Everyone's a Winner!
item.itunes:summary: This week we take a look at the first recorded lottery in England and current news about the lottery in the US.

item.title: Today In Perspective Week of January 8, 2009
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jill Clark, Jeremy Kerr
item.itunes:subtitle: Shattering the Glass Ceiling
item.itunes:summary: This week we take at some of the first minorities to be elected into leadership in American government.
item.itunes:keywords: news, history, today, perspective, minority, minorities, governement

item.title: Today In Perspective Week of October 30, 2008
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jeremy Kerr, Ian Black
item.itunes:subtitle: The Electoral College: Birthday Party vs. 80's Party
item.itunes:summary: This week we take a look at the history of the Electoral College and its role in next week’s General Election.
item.itunes:keywords: news, current events, history, electoral, college, birthday, party

item.title: Today In Perspective Week of November 13, 2008
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jeremy Kerr, Ian Black
item.itunes:subtitle: A Busy Week for NASA
item.itunes:summary: This week we take a look at Novembers of NASA’s past and what they are up to right now.

item.title: Today In Perspective Week of November 20, 2008
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jeremy Kerr, Ian Black
item.itunes:subtitle: Nuclear Testing and Nuclear Banning
item.itunes:summary: This week we take a look at the history of the Nevada Nuclear Test Site and the current state of nuclear weapons in the United States and the world.
item.itunes:keywords: news, current events, history, nuclear, test, ban

item.title: Today In Perspective Week of December 4, 2008
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jeremy Kerr, Ian Black
item.itunes:subtitle: 41st Anniversary of First Successful Human to Human Heart Transplant
item.itunes:summary: This week we take a look at the accomplishment of Dr. Christiaan Barnard, new advances that might soon make the need for heart transplants a thing of the past, and what you can do to save a life!
item.itunes:keywords: news, perspective, current events, history, heart, transplant

item.title: Today In Perspective Week of December 11, 2008
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jeremy Kerr, Jill Clark
item.itunes:subtitle: Alfred Nobel: "Merchant of Death" Makes Good
item.itunes:summary: This week we take a look at Alfred Nobel and the history of his Nobel Prizes, awarded annually on December 10th.
item.itunes:keywords: today, perspective, news, current events, history

item.title: Today In Perspective week of December 25, 2008
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jill Clark, Jeremy Kerr
item.itunes:subtitle: Christmas In Perspective
item.itunes:summary: This week we take a look at the history of our favorite Christmas songs.
item.itunes:keywords: christmas, carol, song, white christmas, Bing Crosby

item.title: Today In Perspective Week of December 18, 2008
item.itunes:author: Hope Christensen, Jeremy Kerr, Jill Clark
item.itunes:subtitle: 1963 Clean Air Act: The Color of the Wind
item.itunes:summary: This week we take a look at the continuing evolution of the 1963 Clean Air Act.
item.itunes:keywords: 1963, EPA, clean, air, clean air act, cow tax, mercury, pollution, Obama
